title: Streamlined Mythbusters Complete
description:
This is a compilation of all current (as of May 22, 2013) streamlined
Mythbusters episodes. These 'Streamline' edits run shorter because they are
missing teasers, cartoons, flashbacks, repetition, history lessons, fun facts,
"we're experts", and anything else that slows down the show.

This is Mythbusters, the way it's meant to be seen.

If you are wondering why the video quality varies it is because many different
people are making these edits over a long period of time. They have similar
styles of editing but there are differences in how they edit and what programs
and source material they use.

All credit for these edits goes to reddit users listed below.  Postdarwin
created the subredditand you should go there if you
want to find more streamlined episodes.
